review.comment:
Marvellous! I could find plenty of places online that would do large bespoke orders but not smaller sizes. I contacted Wholesale POS & quickly found out they’d custom cut a sheet of mirrored Perspex as small as I needed. They were responsive & very helpful (I wasn’t sure whether I should get 3mm or 5mm). My order arrived quickly and in great condition. It was just right for my project.

I’m converting a machinist toolbox into a jewellery box and the mirrored Perspex definitely added an extra special touch! Thank you so much!!!

Brilliant company, amazing service!
The team at Wholesale POS were friendly, helpful and a pleasure to communicate with. The acrylic perspex I ordered for a project, came well packaged and perfectly cut and laser engraved as per my order description.
Cannot recommend these guys enough. Make them your only choice for anything plastic related.
- Thanks guys!
Fantastic service, great communication and superfast delivery! Thoroughly recommended.

I needed 2 pieces of Perspex urgently for a fish tank I was building . I contacted this company who were more than happy to help.
Top class service and kept me up to date on the progress, all paid for and collected within an hour or so.
A big shout out to Maria who was very polite and professional during this order.
I would 100% recommend this company to anyone needing a quality service .
Excellent company. Ordered several mirror acrylic sheets and all cut exactly to size. Very well packed and arrived quickly. Competitively priced too!
REQUIRED A HIGH QUALITY PERFECT FINISH FOR A HIGH END DISPLAY, IN GLOSS BLACK PERSPEX. ARRIVED CUT TO SIZE AND FLAWLESS. FAST DELIVERY. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

I have had my first custom order with them for my project and they have done an excellent job and over my expectation.
I was expecting the edges to be a bit rough but every edge it is smooth to touch and the corners are a perfect match to the front plate of my project.
Thank you

Fantastic service. Prompt delivery, superb secure packaging and great quality perspex. The sheets were cut perfectly to size and fitted straight in.
I highly recommend this company.
excellent company cut tube to length well cut and packaged.many thanks
5 start quality and service always try them first fast turnaround  and reasonably priced excellent  to do business with ☆☆☆☆☆
Don’t even want to give one star, ugliest mirror I’ve ever seen and very small and I paid £34 for it won’t recommend this place.
review.review_reply: Dear Danny, thanks for sharing your feedback. We are however unable to find a reference for you or your order and have not been contacted by yourself. All our mirror orders are bespoke to measurements provided by our customers.  If you could please get in contact and allow us to correct the issue as here at Wholesalepos we pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service and products.

review.comment: Wow, ordered Tuesday afternoon and received Thursday. Brilliant service and very competitive prices. Well recommended ..

Been working with Andrew at WPOS for quite a while now. As a business based entirely around a same day turnaround, we've long seeked a reliable and cost effective supplier for bespoke projects involving acrylic, foamex and aluminium. Andrew has been more than happy to help on every occasion, giving us his dedication on more complex projects and always coming up with the right solution time after time. Thank you and we look forward to finishing our current project with you tomorrow.

Very speedy 😊
It would be very handy to have measurements in “64 year olds “ terms😊
Excellent seller, ordered on phone no problems, delivered next day, very nice guy to deal with.
